#Text=12. Kiki Uses His Magic
#Text=Then arose a great confusion of sounds as all the animals began talking to their fellows .
#Text=The monkeys chattered and the bears growled and the voices of the jaguars and lions rumbled , and the wolves yelped and the elephants had to trumpet loudly to make their voices heard .
#Text=Such a hubbub had never been known in the forest before , and each beast argued with his neighbor until it seemed the noise would never cease .
#Text=Ruggedo the Nome waved his arms and fluttered his wings to try to make them listen to him again , but the beasts paid no attention .
#Text=Some wanted to fight the Oz people , some wanted to be transformed , and some wanted to do nothing at all .
#Text=The growling and confusion had grown greater than ever when in a flash silence fell on all the beasts present , the arguments were hushed , and all gazed in astonishment at a strange sight .
#Text=For into the circle strode a great Lion -- bigger and more powerful than any other lion there -- and on his back rode a little girl who smiled fearlessly at the multitude of beasts .
#Text=And behind the Lion and the little girl came another beast -- a monstrous Tiger , who bore upon his back a funny little man carrying a black bag .
#Text=Right past the rows of wondering beasts the strange animals walked , advancing until they stood just before the rock throne of Gugu .
#Text=Then the little girl and the funny little man dismounted , and the great Lion demanded in a loud voice :
#Text=" Who is King in this forest ? "
#Text=" I am ! " answered Gugu , looking steadily at the other .
#Text=" I am Gugu the Leopard , and I am King of this forest . "
#Text=" Then I greet Your Majesty with great respect , " said the Lion .
#Text=" Perhaps you have heard of me , Gugu .

#Text=You have long claimed to be King of Beasts , but no beast who is a coward can be King over me .

_	_	_	_

#Text= He is n't a coward , Your Majesty , " asserted the little girl , " He 's just cowardly , that 's all . "

column1: #Text=Gugu looked at her .
#Text=All the other beasts were looking at her , too .
#Text=" Who are you ? " asked the King .
#Text=" Me ?

#Text= How dare you come here ? " demanded the King .

column1: #Text=" Why , I 'm not afraid to go anywhere , if the Cowardly Lion is with me , " she said .
#Text=" I know him pretty well , and so I can trust him .

#Text=" We have known you many years ago , before you went to live at the Emerald City , and we have seen you fight the terrible Kalidahs and conquer them , so we know you are the King of all Beasts . "
#Text=" It is true , " replied the Cowardly Lion ; " but I did not come here to rule the beasts of this forest .

#Text= Yes ; you , at least , are welcome to my forest .

#Text= Dorothy has introduced herself , " replied the Lion , " and you are sure to like her when you know her better .

_	_	_	_

#Text= Is he ALWAYS hungry ? " asked Loo the Unicorn .

column1: #Text=" I am , " replied the Tiger , answering the question himself .
#Text=" I am always hungry for fat babies . "
#Text=" Ca n't you find any fat babies in Oz to eat ? " inquired Loo , the Unicorn .
#Text=" There are plenty of them , of course , " said the Tiger , " but unfortunately I have such a tender conscience that it wo n't allow me to eat babies .
